var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;
var document = JsDom.parse(src);

var result = [];

var volumes = document.select(".catalog-volume");
for (var i = 0; i < volumes.size(); i++) {
    var volElement = volumes.get(i);
    
   
    var volTitle = "";
    var volBar = volElement.select(".chapter-bar").first();
    if (volBar) {
        volTitle = volBar.text().trim();
    }
    
   
    var chapters = volElement.select(".chapter-li");
    for (var j = 0; j < chapters.size(); j++) {
        var chapter = chapters.get(j);
        var link = chapter.select("a").first();
        
        if (link) {
            var entry = {
                "text": link.text().trim(),
                "url": link.attr("href").trim(),
                "vol": volTitle
            };
            result.push(entry);
        }
    }
}

result;</js>

<js>
function setArgument(key, value) {
    var open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument, '') || {};
    open_argument[key] = value;
    var result = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(result);
    return result;
}

var open_argument = source.getVariable();
var base_url = getArguments(open_argument, 'server') || '';
var ms = getArguments(open_argument, 'tone_id') || '';
var source_type = getArguments(open_argument, 'source_type') || 'ç”·é¢‘';
var tab = getArguments(open_argument, 'media') || 'å°è¯´';
var sources = getArguments(open_argument, 'source') || 'ç•ªèŒ„';


var sdtoken;
try {
    var loginInfoMap = source.getLoginInfoMap ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {};
    sdtoken = String(loginInfoMap['æ‰‹åŠ¨å¡«å†™ç•ªèŒ„token(å¯ä¸å¡«)'] || '');
} catch (e) {
    sdtoken = '';
}

var rawCookie = getFanqieCookie() || sdtoken;
var match = rawCookie.match(/sessionid=[^;]+/);
var fqcookie = match ? match[0] : '';
var fqssionid = '';
if (!fqcookie) {
    java.toast('æ‚¨è¿˜æœªç™»é™†ç•ªèŒ„è´¦å·ï¼Œæ— æ³•åŒæ­¥æ•°æ®å“¦ï¼');
} else {
    fqssionid = getSessionId(fqcookie)
}
var fqsjurl = base_url + "/bookshelf?page={{page}}&ssionid=" + fqssionid;

var groupDatas = [];
var infoData = [];

function deviceType() {
    try {
        return !!java.androidId();
    } catch (e) {
        return false;
    }
}

var hasValidCookie = fqcookie.length > 0;

if (hasValidCookie) {
    function groupQuery() {
        try {
            var url = base_url + "/group_name?ssionid=" + fqssionid;
            var res = java.ajax(url);
            var response = JSON.parse(res);

            if (!(response && response.data)) {}

            response.data.forEach(function(group) {
                var keys = Object.keys(group);
                if (keys.length > 0) {
                    var key = keys[0];
                    var value = group[key];
                    if (value && value.length) {
                        var option = {
                            "method": "POST",
                            "body": {
                                "book_ids": value,
                                "page": "{{page}}"
                            }
                        };
                        groupDatas.push({
                            title: key,
                            url: base_url + "/bookshelf," + JSON.stringify(option),
                            style: {
                                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                                layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                            }
                        });
                    }
                }
            });

            if (groupDatas.length % 2 !== 0) {
                groupDatas.push({
                    title: "--",

<js>
(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 13_3_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/13.0.5 Mobile/15E148 Snapchat/10.77.5.59 (like Safari/604.1)"
	})
})()
</js>

var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("1701019k").getBytes(),"DES");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AQIDBAUGBwg="));
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
String(decrypt(JSON.parse(result).DATA.CTXT)).replace(/{{title}}/,'')
</js>
